name: Danger of Deluge
description:
Only had time to implement the tutorial section but the concept is a survival/story-driven platformer centered around companions, and using umbrellas as bus stops as shelters from acid rain.

Submission for Weekly Game Jam 152 with theme 'shelter'.

Instructions:

Well hopefully the tutorial is clear at least!

Graphic credits to IG @ s.uune

Font used: basis33

Tools: Godot, Audacity, Gimp
